messages.title: Students for Paul Blomfield
messages.content: We're backing Paul Blomfield for Sheffield Central.

messages.title: Sheffield Union President backs Paul Blomfield
messages.content: Paul Blomfield is committed to funding for students. He has campaigned against university tuition fee rises for 10 years. Now the MP for Sheffield Central, he supports students.

messages.title: The right choice for Sheffield Central
messages.content: Paul has a track record of delivering for students.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning for fairer university funding and opposing any attempts to increase tuition fees.
Working for more jobs in Sheffield to reduce high graduate unemployment.
Giving students a strong voice in the community.
Continuing to crack down on bad landlords who let out substandard services.
Protecting frontline services in Sheffield by investing in policing, schools, childcare and health.

issues.education: NUS President Wes Streeting backs Paul Blomfield as the best candidate for students.

housing.content: We need to continue to crack down on bad landlords who let out substandard services.

endorsements.endorsement: Backs Paul Blomfield as the best candidate for students.
Paul's commitment really impressed Hallam students.

images.caption: NUS National President backs Paul Blomfield.
